name: >>Anyget/ Bulletin Board Style Novel Writing Support Tool
description: This tool supports the writing of stories composed of multiple posts set on social media and anonymous forums. Based on the developer's writing experience, it includes various features beneficial to writers, such as rearranging posts, generating random IDs, and copying & pasting posts.
